content: materials to make your blanket just like this one you can order the same 52 skeins of koigu premium merino kpm 100% merino wool that were used they are 11 skeins of color #00 for the borders 41 skeins for the inside squares one skein of each of the following colors - first column far left from the top 1175 1173 1155 1145 1143 2121 1100 2227 2229 2220 and 1195 - second column 1110 2200 1240 1200 2180 2100 2335 2423 1521 and 1521 5 - third column 2339 1520 1051 1532 1504 1500 2130 1045 1043 and 1010 5 - fourth column 3016 2405 2403 2390 5 2290 3003 2164 2416 1156 and 1400 note the blanket is made up of 108 squares but this is enough colored yarn to make over 400 inside squares you would need more yarn for the outside borders you will also need - a size d 3 25 mm crochet hook 1 gauge 6¼ double crochets = 1 inch size - finished dimensions 40 inches x 54 inches - finished square approximately 4 5 inches square note crib size to make a smaller 32 x 41 inch version of the rainbow blanket you ll need just 13 skeins of koigu premium merino 7 colors for the inside squares and 6 of color #00 for the outside borders arrange the 63 finished squares however you want and click here 2 for palette inspiration designed by purl soho designer whitney van nes 3 1 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=23805 2 https //www purlsoho com/create/2012/11/15/bears-rainbow-blanket/ 3 https //www purlsoho com/create/tag/whitney-van-nes-for-purl-soho/
